Enjoy A Relaxing Retreat At Mandarin Orintal GuangzhouUANGZHOU Published on : Tuesday, September 22, 2015
Embark on a luxurious spa journey as Mandarin Oriental, Guangzhou introduces a Relaxing Retreat package to rejuvenate the mind and body.
Designed to allow you to have peace and tranquility away from the hustle and bustle of the city, guest can enjoy the best of the city and of the hotel, including accommodation in a spacious 70sqm Club Mandarin Room, access to the exclusive Oriental Club Lounge including breakfast, evening cocktail, one way transfer between airport or East / South railway station, and an indulgent 60-minute Oriental Essence treatment in the award-winning Spa for up to two persons.
The Oriental Essence massage is part of Mandarin Orientalâ€™s signature spa therapies and focuses on all stress areas of the body. Utilising its signature quintessence oil blended with ginger, mandarin orange and frankincense, this relaxing treatment is set to realign the mind and emotions.
Price starts from CNY 2,488 subject to 15% service charge per night. Valid until 31 March
2016, this package is subject to availability and advance reservations are required.
Source:- Mandarin Oriental
